Reviews.Title: Serves the purpose
Reviews.Author: gunnydo
Reviews.Content: The dual SIM feature of this phone is the basic high point. It is sleek and lightweight. The screen is difficult to see, especially in bright sunlight. I have not attempted to use a screen guard for sunshading. The touch features are not very sensitive despite calibrating again and again. The camera does take good photos. Texting is difficult due to the touchscreen issues and the fact that the letters are basic abc, def multitouch. There is no keyboard feature. This phone serves its purpose in general but next time I will buy a higher quality phone with a better touchscreen.

ProductInfo.Features:
Network: GSM/GPRS/EDGE 850/900/1800/1900. Included in the box: LG-T510, Stereo Headset, USB Data Cable, Travel Adapter, Battery, Software, User Guide
Display size: 2.8'', Display Type: touch screen, resistive, Resolution: 240x320 px
Camera Resolution: 2 Mpx
Internal memory: 60 Mb. MicroSD Slot (up to 4GB support)
FM Radio and MP3 Music Player, Speakerphone, Voice Recording, Document Viewer, Calendar/Organizer, Alarm, Phone Book Entries: 1000, Bluetooth 2.1, 1,100mAh battery
ProductInfo.Name: LG T510 Dual Sim Unlocked GSM Phone with Touchscreen, 2MP Camera, FM Radio and Bluetooth - Unlocked Phone - No Warranty - Black
